duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a portfolio of ~75 Harvard Clubs and Shared Interest Groups, partnering with and managing a portfolio of alumni communities including Harvard Clubs located domestically and in Canada, as well as SIGs. This includes building strategic relationships with Club and SIG leaders, knowledge of their strengths and areas for improvement, transitions, difficult conversations, and escalated situations.
Manage a selection of programs to build alumni awareness of and engagement with Harvard Clubs and SIGs, including Summer Community Service and SIG Meetups.
Manage, and coach Alumni Relations Assistant, overseeing their assigned duties and programs. Support the Alumni Relations Assistant in building professional skills and lead on performance management.

Contribute to the strategic direction, culture, and approaches of the Clubs and SIGs team. Establish and maintain strong partnerships within the HAA and AA&D, as well as alumni relations colleagues throughout the University to build University-wide engagement through the Clubs and SIGs network.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Alumni Relations, Volunteer Management, Higher Education, or a related field (Master's preferred)
